content:
/>
II.i.1.B.4.c
.
Handling Unscanned Shipments That Are Marked as Completed
Unscanned shipments in a
Completed
status can be located and scanned using the
BTS Issue Tracker
.  The table below provides instruction on how to request scanning of the documents.
Step
Action
1
Select the
BTS Issue Tracker Form
and complete the SUBMITTER INFORMATION fields.
2
Select the
Rescan: Missing Document
scanning vendor request type.
3
Complete the SHIPMENT DETAILS fields and provide an explanation in the ADDITIONAL INFORMATION field.
4
Click SUBMIT.
Reference
:  For more information on using the
BTS Issue Tracker
, see the
FCS Training Manual
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Veterans Claims Intake Program (VCIP) Shipping
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
